General.Name: Karelian Diamond Resources PLC
General.Description: Karelian Diamond Resources Plc engages in the discovery, evaluation, and development of diamond deposits. It holds interests in the Lahtojoki diamond project located in the Kuopio"Kaavi region in Finland; and the Seitaperä diamondiferous kimberlite pipe and the Riihivaara diamond projects situated in the Kuhmo area, Finland. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland.
General.Address: 3300 Lake Drive, Dublin, Ireland, D24 TD21

1.Name: Mr. Kevin  McNulty MSc, BSc, P.Geo, FSEG
